testsuite.name: com.magneto.mutants.integration.ApiIntegrationTest

testcase.name: POST /mutant should return 400 Bad Request for invalid DNA
POST /mutant should return 403 Forbidden for a human DNA
POST /mutant should return 200 OK for a mutant DNA
